de.erichseifert.gral.plots

Class BarPlot.BarRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.erichseifert.gral.plots.points.AbstractPointRenderer
      • de.erichseifert.gral.plots.points.DefaultPointRenderer2D
        • de.erichseifert.gral.plots.BarPlot.BarRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PointRenderer, java.io.Serializable
    Enclosing class:
    BarPlot

    public static class BarPlot.BarRenderer
extends DefaultPointRenderer2D
    Class that renders a bar in a bar plot.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getBarShape

        protected java.awt.Shape getBarShape(double x,
                         double y,
                         double width,
                         double height)
        Returns the shape for a bar. The default shape is defined in the settings, but more complex shapes may be implemented by overriding this method.
        Parameters:
        x - Distance from the left in view units (e.g. pixels).
        y - Distance from the top in view units (e.g. pixels).
        width - Width of the shape in view units (e.g. pixels).
        height - Height of the shape in view units (e.g. pixels).
        Returns:
        A geometric shape for displaying a bar in bar plot.

      • getValue

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Component that can be used to draw the value label.
